item.title: Gadwal Officer Quickly Helps Bihar Man Get Back Rs 8,000 Lost at ATM
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: Sub-Inspector Kalyan Kumar from Gadwal Town Police quickly found a lost sum of ₹8,000 in just one hour, impressing both a man from Bihar and local residents.
The situation unfolded near the Registrar Office in Gadwal. Vinod Khan, originally from Bihar, tried to deposit ₹8,000 into an SBI ATM. Unaware that the ATM rejected his transaction, he left without checking if the money was credited.
- Advertisement -

item.title: Helping Hands Trust and MLA Work Together to Support Rural Education in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: In an inspiring event focused on enhancing rural education, MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy attended a study material distribution program at the Government Practicing High School in Gadwal, organized by the Helping Hands Charitable Trust.
The MLA spoke to the audience, highlighting education as the highest charity. He said, “Every student should aim high. Education brings knowledge, discipline, and purpose. It can change society.”
- Advertisement -
